snippet: A New Jersey boy died on Tuesday after being shot in the head a day earlier by his 4-year-old neighbor while they were playing outside.
lead_paragraph: A New Jersey boy died on Tuesday after being shot in the head a day earlier by his 4-year-old neighbor while they were playing outside.

headline.seo: Boy, 6, Dies After Being Shot by Boy, 4, in Toms River, N.J.
headline.main: 4-Year-Old Boy Fatally Shoots 6-Year-Old in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: 4-Year-Old Boy Fatally Shoots 6-Year-Old in New Jersey
